description: Ontology describing Numerica's UI meaning layer for surfaces, components, roles, and categories.

DOM.purpose: Application chrome, controls, text surfaces rendered via React/DOM.
constraints: Uses CSS tokens for spacing, typography, borders, and signature shadow

WEBGL.purpose: Primary modeling viewport + stickers rendered via custom WebGL renderer.
constraints: Grid + overlays align to integer pixel density

NODE_GRAPH.purpose: Numerica workflow canvas representing semantic nodes/edges.
constraints: Category colors must come from ontology category palette
Typography uses primary font for titles, secondary for labels

roles.chrome: Structural framing surfaces (top bar, panels) that recede visually.
roles.control: Interactive inputs (buttons, dropdowns) with mechanical feedback.
roles.decorative: Brand/sticker treatments that cannot change geometry.
roles.state: Indicators, badges, node states tied to semantic operations.
